refnamediv.refpurpose: Includes an external file for processing.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Includes an external file for processing.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: This takes input from the named file until it ends, when input reverts to the previous input. Note: Csound versions prior to 4.19 had a limit of 20 on the depth of included files and macros.
Another suggested use of #include would be to define a set of macros which are part of the composer's style.

If the version of Csound is built with the CURL library the filename in an #include statement can be an URL, recognised by including the substring "://" in the name. This will include text via protocols such as http, https, and ftp.
